pr_title: DPC-542 Feature: Add new `make` command to simplify local manual build process

timeline.bodyText: It might be clearer to move this section up before Building DPC, since it has to happen before you can build. Maybe Preparing to Build DPC with a subheader of Decrypting encrypted files?
timeline.author: em1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -45,20 +45,37 @@ This can be fixed by setting the working directory to the project root, but need
 
 Building DPC
 ---
+### Decrypt encrypted files

replies.bodyText: Good point! I saw it as the first step of the build process, but really it's separate from the build. Thanks!
replies.author: jonfulk

timeline.message: Update sample conf with missing keys

Add `make maven-config` command

when running `mvn clean install`, the local.env variables are not
accessible. This command will allow the developer to easily
copy decrypted environment variables from local.env
to .mvn/maven.config prior to running the install cmd.

DPC-542
Do not commit `.mvn` directory to version control
Update README for clarity and to include new `make` commands
Update README for clarity and to include new `make` commands
